name: Fade - A Ghost Story
description:
PLEASE NOTE: There is a bug on level 5 (Halloween) that stops you from progressing further in the story. My apologies for this, and I will be uploading a fixed version of the game once voting has finished.

A story of a ghost who travels back through time to try and get back it's lost memories. This short game was made in a week for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021. It's also the first game I've made, so any comments or feedback would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks, and hope you enjoy!
